text: Harmony Aesthetics & Wellness is a medical aesthetics and wellness clinic with locations in Kensington, Maryland and Falls Church, Virginia. The clinic focuses on personalized care, natural-looking results, and a welcoming, patient-centered environment. All treatments are tailored to each individual’s goals and performed by trained medical professionals.

Harmony Aesthetics & Wellness offers Botox injections to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Botox is commonly used to treat forehead lines, frown lines between the eyebrows, and crow’s feet around the eyes. Treatments are quick, minimally invasive, and designed to deliver natural-looking results while preserving facial expression.

Dermal fillers are offered to restore volume, enhance facial contours, and smooth wrinkles. Common treatment areas include the cheeks, lips, jawline, chin, and nasolabial folds. Harmony Aesthetics & Wellness prioritizes balanced, subtle enhancements tailored to each patient’s facial anatomy.

The clinic provides a variety of facial and skin rejuvenation treatments aimed at improving skin texture, tone, and overall appearance. These treatments may help reduce acne, pigmentation, fine lines, and dullness while promoting healthy, glowing skin.

Harmony Aesthetics & Wellness offers IV hydration and vitamin therapy designed to support wellness, energy, immunity, and recovery. IV therapy delivers fluids and nutrients directly into the bloodstream for fast absorption and effective results.

All new patients begin with a personalized consultation. During the consultation, a provider reviews medical history, discusses aesthetic goals, and recommends a customized treatment plan. Consultations ensure treatments are safe, appropriate, and aligned with patient expectations.

The clinic emphasizes natural-looking results that enhance existing features rather than dramatically altering appearance. Treatments are conservative and focused on harmony, balance, and long-term skin health.

Harmony Aesthetics & Wellness follows strict medical safety standards. All injectable treatments are administered by trained professionals using FDA-approved products. Patient safety, comfort, and informed consent are prioritized at every visit.

Harmony Aesthetics & Wellness has two locations: Kensington, Maryland and Falls Church, Virginia. Both locations offer a welcoming, modern environment designed to make patients feel comfortable and relaxed during their visit.
Appointments can be scheduled by contacting Harmony Aesthetics & Wellness directly. Patients are encouraged to book consultations in advance to ensure availability and personalized attention.
Most adults seeking aesthetic or wellness treatments may be good candidates. A consultation is required to determine suitability based on medical history, skin condition, and individual goals.

Treatments at Harmony Aesthetics & Wellness are designed to be efficient and comfortable. Many procedures require little to no downtime, allowing patients to return to daily activities shortly after their appointment.
Pricing varies depending on the treatment type, product used, and individual treatment plan. Detailed pricing is discussed during consultations to ensure transparency and clarity before treatment.

Aftercare instructions are provided following each treatment to promote optimal results and healing. Patients are encouraged to follow all post-treatment guidelines and contact the clinic with any concerns.
Harmony Aesthetics & Wellness values trust, education, and long-term relationships with patients. The clinic aims to empower individuals by providing expert guidance and honest recommendations.
